overview: Dream Concert, which first began in 1995, is an annual large-scale concert in Korea that brings together popular singers for a fun music festival. In 2020 and 2021, the event was held online due to the COVID-19 pandemic, but this year’s Dream Concert welcomed back in-person concertgoers for the first time in three years. On June 18, over 45,000 people were in attendance at the Seoul Olympic Stadium.  The 2022 Dream Concert was hosted by NCT’s Doyoung and IVE’s An Yu Jin, and the star-studded lineup of performers included NCT DREAM, IVE, Red Velvet, NMIXX, Oh My Girl, Dreamcatcher, STAYC, VICTON, Kep1er, CIX, Golden Child, Weeekly, LABOUM, PENTAGON, AB6IX, CRAVITY, WEi, DRIPPIN, ALICE (formerly known as ELRIS), CLASS:y, TAN, LIGHTSUM, YOUNITE, EPEX, KINGDOM, TRENDZ, and Lee Mujin.
title: 2022 Dream Concert
